channel.title: Username Value c#
channel.description: I'm trying to use key.Text = "Username: " + Login.KeyAuthApp.user_data.username; but it gives me the value of the key and not the username I'd like to get the value of the username, but I'm getting the key. Being that, I'm using the same code that is working in github keyauth

item.description:
depends on how that account was registered cuz if it was via license only then yes username will just return the key but if the account was registered with username and password then it would show the name

item.description:
I’m trying to use key.Text = "Username: " + Login.KeyAuthApp.user_data.username; but it gives me the value of the key and not the username
I’d like to get the value of the username, but I’m getting the key. Being that, I’m using the same code that is working in github keyauth
